page.title: 14LOCAL EVENTS NEAR WIDEGATES.
page.content: Every year at Morval a Traction Rally is held.This usually takes place during the last week of July. On display are a variety of old_ fashioned transport and machinery. You can see old cars,motor bikes, steam engines and side stalls are available for refreshment. The Elephant Fayre at St Germans is a musical festival held annually. Although this is generally an expensive event, it is an enjoyable day for all the family.Top enterainers come from all over the country not only to sing but to perform acts of drama,mime and plays.
